description: The SSO and SCO had a banner year in 2023, with albums hitting the classical charts. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: 2023: Big scores for Singapore orchestras and classical musicians
title_page: 2023: Big scores for Singapore orchestras and classical musicians | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – The classical music scene is alive and thriving in Singapore, closing 2023 with a slew of achievements.
The Singapore Symphony Orchestra (SSO) and Singapore Chinese Orchestra (SCO) entered the top 20 of Britain’s Official Specialist Classical Chart in July.
